com.seaglasslookandfeel.util
Class PlatformUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.seaglasslookandfeel.util.PlatformUtils

public class PlatformUtils
extends Object

Platform utilities to determine anything we need to do differently on a platform or JRE basis.

Based on MacWidgets for Java by Ken Orr.

Author:
Ken Orr
